hover_help: Uses your normal macOS sleep settings.
Keeps your Mac and display awake while the lid is open.
Disables system sleep, including with lid closed, until you turn it off.
System sleep was disabled outside AwakeBar. Turn it off here to restore defaults.
Keeps your Mac and display awake while the lid is open.
Keeps your Mac running with the lid closed. Uses one-time admin setup for passwordless toggles.
Launch AwakeBar automatically after you sign in.
Turns off both Keep Awake modes.
